column6: "INTIFADA" pt. 2 & 3 (of 5) As the X-Treme team gets closer to the heart of Intifada, they realize that there is more to this mutant dilemma than they previously thought! Plus, a surprise guest star! 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99 (each)
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Igor Kordey | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
